event.title: Post-Relay pub trip
event.description:
Anyone who's heading to SQL Relay (or even if you're not!) and would like to have a post-relay wind-down in a nearby pub it would be great to see you!

We'll be there shortly after the closing session ends, so feel free to hang round in the hotel foyer and wait for us, or see you in the pub!

Prince Street Social is very close, come out of the hotel conference entrance and cross the road :)

We'll post updates here if we've moved on due to it being too busy etc.
